metadata.title: CVE-2018-20198 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in ifilter_bank oflibfaad/filtbank.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. Thevulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, whichleads to denial of service because adding to windowed output is mishandledin the LONG_START_SEQUENCE case.

criterions.comment: faad2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
